segments.text: Did you even bother to go to school today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I went . Did you go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't feel like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's nice , have you been to the movies lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but that was a random change of subject .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It may have been random , but have you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would love to catch a movie this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So then , why don't you just go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want to see a movie by myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , so are you going to school tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I might just go to the movies .
segments.speaker: S2
